summary: Adds an interior named "Ultra Garden" that allows you to plant ingredients.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds an interior named "Ultra Garden" (well, I know this is not a good name) that allows you to plant alchemy ingredients. The interior consists of nine floors, each floor has fifty planters (so total is 450) and an activator to harvest ingredients.

There is a spell tome which teaches you a Lesser Power that teleport to the place (craft at Tanning Rack using 1 Grand Soul Gem and 1 Goat Hide).

Requires latest version of Skyrim and Hearthfire.

Note:
Should be compatible with most of the mods, but there might be some bugs that I didn't aware of, so remember to backup your save file before using this mod. Also leave a comment if you encounter any bug.

Resources Used:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19066/?]HoddminirGroundTextures[/url]

Tools Used:
[url=http://www.creationkit.com/Main_Page]Creation Kit
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37981/?]Merge Plugins xEdit Script[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url]
author: zenghis
